mapper.select: SELECT b.buyerName buyerName, b.country country, b.address address, b.phone phone, b.manager manager, b.businessNumber businessNumber FROM Order_header oh JOIN Buyer b ON oh.buyerCode = b.buyerCode WHERE oh.orderId = #{orderId};

SELECT p.productName productName, p.productType productType, p.weight weight, p.size size, p.unit unit, oi.finalPrice finalPrice, oi.quantity quantity, oi.sum sum FROM Order_item oi JOIN Product p ON oi.productCode = p. productCode JOIN SalePrice sp ON oi.priceId = sp.priceId JOIN Order_header oh ON oi.orderCode = oh.orderCode WHERE oh.orderId = #{orderId};
